content: crochet blanket pattern slow down us terminology general info i dedicate the pattern slow down to all mothers and fathers who love care and value every moment spent with their children the pattern is my crochet vision of the song slow down by nichole nordeman a busy pattern in the center with a flower accent and different textured stitches slows down afterwards representing the time spent with our children since they were born till they grow up the pattern will look gorgeous if you use a few solid colors one solid color self striping with long color changes like mandala sirdar color wheel or sirdar snuggly pattercake or even ombre and long gradient yarn this pattern can create any size square blanket but you could also join squares together creating a stunning king size bed
